ConnectionStrings.BitClub7DB: Connection string to the database of the application

ApplicationSettings.ApiUrl: URL to the application API (eg. http://sample.com/api)
ApplicationSettings.AllowedOrigins: Origin websites to have access to the API (http://sample.com/api)

BitBayPayApiSettings.PublicKey: Public key for the BitBayPay API access account
BitBayPayApiSettings.PrivateKey: Private key for the BitBayPay API access account
BitBayPayApiSettings.DestinationCurrency: Destination currency in the BitBayPay system - read documentation first(eg. BTC)
BitBayPayApiSettings.SourceCurrency: Source currency in the BitBayPay system - read documentation first(eg. BTC)
BitBayPayApiSettings.NotificationsUrl: URL callback to the payment notification from the BitBayPay API (eg. http://sample.com/api/payments/paymentNotification)
